minecraft:behavior.move_towards_dwelling.description: Allows Guardians, Iron Golems and Villagers to move within their pre-defined area that the mob should be restricted to. Other mobs don't have a restriction defined.

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal.

minecraft:behavior.move_towards_home_res.description: Allows Guardians, Iron Golems and Villagers to move within their pre-defined area that the mob should be restricted to. Other mobs don't have a restriction defined.

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal.

look_at_target.description: If true, the mob will face the entity it sends an event to.
